text: læa phra phu pen ceakhxng cea khux phuthrng xphay phuthrng metta semx hak phraxngkh ca thrng xea thosʹ phwk khea tam thi phwk khea di sasm xea wi nænxn phraxngkh ca thrng reng kar lngthosʹ kæ phwk khea tæ sahrab phwk khea mi kahnd wela sung phwk khea ca mi phb thiphung xun dı nxkcak phraxngkh
